title: 01 The Silver Pigs
description:
4 x 30 mins

The first of five dramatisations of the Falco novels.

Rome 70AD and a new Emperor sits on the throne. A young heiress is murdered and her distraught family call on private informer Marcus Didius Falco to investigate. His investigations lead him to a place beyond the civilised world..... Britain. To make it even worse, there he meets the dead girl's cousin, the fearful Helena Justina.
